reviews.review_text: Food was delicious   . I love the little bib they give you before you eat. It ended up falling off but it s all good!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for sharing your feedback with us. We are delighted to know that you had a positive experience with us. Look forward to your future visit!

reviews.review_text: Went there with my family and we were impressed. Staff was friendly and food was good. We were seated right away and waitress helped us with the menu. She answered our questions and familiarized us with their menu and the way they cook.  We ordered Pirates feast with a lobster. Food came in bags, one bag of mussels, one bag of clams and the lobster, We got paper bibs, gloves and scissors to use. It was messy but the food was very tasty and we enjoyed it.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: So glad you had a great experience, Jana. We look forward to serving you again soon!

reviews.review_text: This is one of the better locations. Service and food quality always good and consistent. Staff are very pleasant and accommodating. Always a go to seafood           place for us. Delicious sauce and fresh. Gets messy, but messy is fun and delicious They do give you gloves and apron to stay clean

This place was wonderful. Most people will complain that their food came in a bag, or they didnt get a bib, or they had to peel their own shrimp. If you havent had a seafood boil, you might wanna google before you go. It was nice to see the place busy! They had a wide selection of seafood and other options to choose from. We had the Lobster, Dungeness, and crawfish among a few other things. It was great. Everything was cooked well. They do state that there is a headless shrimp option also! It costs a small amount more but you do get more. We were full by the end. The only complaint was with our server. We werent offered any drinks except water and had to get the attention of another waitress to take our drink order. We also sat and waited a long while after finishing before letting someone know we were ready for the bill. We noticed our waiter pacing/loitering at the other end of the restaurant but never checked on us. We felt bad bugging the lovely waitress who was being diligent with her own tables.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for sharing your feedback with us. We are delighted to know that you had a great experience with us. Look forward to your future visit!

reviews.review_text: First time to eat there, food was great also the ambiance, close to the road and easy to be found, But I think staff didnt understand what were looking for, but its all fine. 2nd Visit July 10 2023. Still delicious food Good for seafoods lover
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience at The Captains Boil. We are so pleased to hear you found your experience your liking. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

reviews.review_text: We were a little apprehensive at first given some of the poor reviews but definitely glad we tried this place out for ourselves! It was delicious and we had a great experience. SERVICE Not sure why the other reviews say bad service because the servers were wonderful! They did seem quite busy (looked like 2 servers for the whole restaurant) but they were personable and v helpful. FOOD Seeing other reviews complaining about the spice seems really silly - it s a seafood boil so of course it s going to be at least a little spicy. Cajun is crucial for this type of cuisine! It s how they do it down south. If you don t like spice, try another cuisine lol We got the  luxury for 2  and that was the perfect amount of food for us two. Ours came on a plate and the crab was delicious. Loved the lotus roots that were perfectly cooked. The corn was a bit bland  but just soaked it up in the sauce (we went mild which was just enough spice). Yes, the shrimps comes w head on and there s no cutlery aside from the seafood cracker. Again, this is standard for seafood boils. We didn t bother with gloves - best to just go all in! Overall, great experience and would come again.

So... The food tastes just like the photos make out to be. We went with a party of 4 (hungry). Ordered the Captain for 6, and we destroyed it! We mixed up the favors Captains Boil, Garlic, Lemon and the Cajun, plus did the medium Spice, except the rice. Our minds were blown away . Next time, I go full spicy They did not have the King Crab but, they were more then willing to substitute with more Lobster or Dungeness and we did both  . It was my first time eating here and I already want to go back. Pricey, but worth it, says I
I m a big fan of seafood and the foods are amazing! Super tasty!! Bcos this is my first time here so I don t really know what I pick, and the server is very kind and helps me out !!

Captain Boil is a big franchise seafood restaurant. It has more than 30 restaurants across Canada in different cities. There are five locations in the Great Vancouver area. I have been to the two locations before: one is on Robson St. Downtown and another one is on Kingsway Vancouver. Both of the locations served quite delicious seafood. Very enjoy eating at Captain Boil. Captain Boil Robson St. Location is at 1487 Robson St, Vancouver, BC V6G 1C1. The location is on the one of busiest st downtown Vancouver. There are many restaurants on this street, attract so many customers. I had lunch with my friend at this location. we had a great experience there. We arrived at the restaurant around 12 pm when it just opened. So, the restaurant was not busy. Since it s on the weekend, it didn t serve the lunch combo. We decided to order seafood separately. We ordered Shrimps, Mussels, and Snow Crab legs 1lb each with Cajun, Captain s Boil and Garlic sauces. All the seafood we ordered comes in the arrival of the mains, not on plates, but straight out of the boiling pot with flavors added, delivered to the table still steaming hot in big (biodegradable)  clear-plastic bags!  Mussels are my most favorite dish in this place. They are big and very great quality.

The place is taking the social distance cautions. The staff is nice and kind and we really enjoyed. We ordered the Cajun fries and the seafood fried rice, also shrimps because are very affordable. The rice is amazing, it s like melting in your mouth. The fries are good and the we liked the shrimps, but we loved the rice. Even though the portion seemed huge we finished everything. The experience of wearing apron and gloves to eat with the hands is fun. We recommend the place.

The freshest and sweetest tasting seafood that is unmatched by anywhere else. The captains mix sauce heightened the seafood. The shrimps, mussels, squid and especially the lobster was tender and juicy and well coated in the delicious sauce. The corn and potatoes add to the boil and help keep you full. Definitely worth the trip to Captains Boil. Wash it down with some Soju for the ultimate experience.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: asianburnout, thanks for taking time out of your day to review us. Have a great day!

reviews.review_text: Fun experience, delicious home made sauce, fresh seafood at its best. Price is valued just right for the quality.

Visited this space with my family in honour of my dad who was a Captain on a trawler. We shared memories of him as we dined. The food was excellent. Best seafood weve ever had since coming to Canada over 20 years ago.
First time there. Be sure to ask how much things are. It adds up fast. 1 pound of shrimp will feed 2 to 3 people. But overall a good place.
Couldn t dine in but the seafood boil at home experience was great! The calamari and fried rice was also a hit.
Just got in after my flight. Such a wonderful owner. Great service and great value for the price. Cool looking restaurant. Deserves more stars. Thank you so much for your hospitality.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review, we hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: I once ordered this at a hotel and had to take off all of my clothes and layout towels to eat it. The food was 100% worth the discomfort of being completely naked while sharing a room with my father in law. That being said, the restaurant experience is a lot better. They lay down paper, give you gloves and bibs. This equates to less nudity, and more enjoyment of the food. ( Which I rate 9/10. )
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your five-star review. We are delighted to hear that you had a positive experience with us at The Captains Boil. We hope you ll visit us again soon.

reviews.review_text: A fantastic experience for a group of 30 !  Yes 30 people - an entire softball team and their parents and coaches - on a Friday night !  Cannot thank the entire staff and management for making our first Captains Boil so memorable ! Dietary restrictions: A member of our group had a allergy and was offered a complete meal cooked to her specifications .  No extra charge ! Kid-friendliness: A group of 12 -15 year old softball players had a night of memories !  Such great food and service !
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your five-star review. We are delighted to hear that you had a positive experience with us at The Captains Boil. We hope you ll visit us again soon.

reviews.review_text: Delicious seafood!!   highly recommend their garlic sauce or captain s boil sauce with lobster and king crab legs! Price is reasonable and service was great. Excellent experience!
It was a fun place to eat with fabulous food while on our vacation.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for sharing your feedback with us. We are delighted to know that you had a great experience with us. Look forward to your future visit!

reviews.review_text: Best seafood Ive ever had! Amazing and polite service and a great seafood experience
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that we were able to provide you with an enjoyable dining experience.

reviews.review_text: The flavour was perfect, the sauce just the right consistency.  If youre after a good New Orlean seafood boil,  this is it.
Fantastic food and excellent service. Reasonably-priced too. Good serving portions. Great value for money.

The four of us had our first meal at the Captains Boil...we enjoyed the meal for four. I think the seafood rice could use more scallops and shrimp. Butter for all four people and not just one butter being served to share. Not when the meal is made for four people. I hope its real butter and not the butter pump at a movie theatre. I forgot to ask. Real butter matters hahaha It was very tasty me and my family loved every bit of it. Eventually a glove came off.

The place is neat and the food is really good. They provide disposable gloves and bib. You can eat with your hands or with utensils. Since i came from a country where we eat with our hands, its easy for me but if youre not used to it, itll be really messy. I really like the  sauce that they use, it complements with the seafood. Though the price is expensive, its worth the experience, ambiance and especially the flavor.
Great seafood place for group hang out. Seafood is fresh!

The servers there are so friendly and helpful, its my first time to captains boil, its a bit confused to the menu and how to order, the server was so patient and have us some good recommendations. The food is amazing, will definitely come again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Really appreciate the rating. Is there anything you d like to share that we can pass along to the team?

reviews.review_text: Brilliant food, especially their special sauce
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for sharing your feedback with us. We are delighted to know that you had a great experience with us. Look forward to your future visit!

reviews.review_text: Fast service, fresh and yummy seafood, and friendly servers!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for sharing your feedback with us. We are delighted to know that you had a great experience with us. Look forward to your future visit!

reviews.review_text: Was pleasantly surprised by this place.  Had a coupon for shrimp.  The medium spicy Captains boil sauce on a pound of shrimp plus a corn add-on was very tasty.  Spice level was perfect for me, and the shrimp was not overcooked. Seafood fried rice was good and was a big portion that would have been plenty to share as a side for several people. I wound up putting some of the sauce with the juices from the shrimp from the bag on the rice, and its a shame that most people will waste it (would be nice if there could be some comp bread for this).  Service was very friendly. Only open for about a month, so Im giving them some slack on running out of the clams that I was looking forward to getting.  Im sure they will work that out as they go along or maybe just everyone wanted clams today.  Place was comfy.  Only thing is that there isnt always real dishware.  Water comes in disposable plastic cups instead of glasses or even reusable plastic cups, and the pop is just served in the can. But the rice came on a real plate with a metal spoon. I didnt use the plastic bib (though did use paper napkins tucked in my shirt) and gloves to try to cut down on the plastic waste but everyone else in the place did.  The bags for the seafood are biodegradable though at least.
Love Captains Boil! We always get a feast and its more than enough to fill you up! You must try their Shrimp Fried Rice! Food : 5/5
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that we were able to provide you with an enjoyable dining experience.

reviews.review_text: Great service. Great food and very tasty. They served market priced for the seafood. The sauces are great and we went with the mussels, crab and prawns.  I loved their cajun fries.  It is a great place to eat with family. I will come back again.
If your craving seafood, this is the place to come... and come hungry!!!

Great place to enjoy a feast with friends and family. A truly intimate and bonding experience. Food was great, staff were super friendly. Music was a bit loud, but not really a problem to us as we were digging the tunes. I hope theyll open a branch in New Westminster or in Metrotown. I highly recommended it. Well definitely be back.

Excellent service very good food fairy tasty. One of the best seafood restaurants in downtown. They have all the safety in covid. Automatic scan thermometer at the door before you go in. With hand sanitizer and clear guard between table. I feel very safe dining at this restaurant. Will come back for sure.

This place has one of the best seafood Ive ever had with above and beyond service! The menu has a selection of premium to budget items. If youre low on cash, get the sizzling plate, its big enough for two! It also has nice decor with a view looking towards Robson st.

I have dined in once and ordered in multiple times and I havent been disappointed. The seafood is delicious and well sized. Only thing was that the oysters on the day were tiny ! But they made up for it by throwing in an extra . Do not miss their fried rice ..its the BOMB !

We are visiting from the US and stumbled upon this place after shopping on Robson. The food was great. Seafood is very fresh. You have to go with the Captains boil sauce. The experience is hassle-free, just put on gloves and dig in.. Will come back again with my family.
The Apron experience is very interesting and the food is amazing
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for sharing your feedback with us. We are delighted to know that you had a great experience with us. Look forward to your future visit!

reviews.review_text: Captains boil knocks it out of the park every time I ve visited,I ve visited countless times and it s always a blast.

Very delicious meal.  Not much seafood restaurant in Vancouver. This is definitely the best in downtown.  Especially the king crab they are huge like 18 long omg. Very tasty and the service is great. Definitely will go back again.

Good place to eat with good prices for seafood. Staff are friendly and proactive. However, this location needs better air ventilation. Summer time gets way too hot in the restaurant without the front door open. Still a great place nonetheless.
Very good environment. Food was delicious especially the lobstor and king crab   . Will love to come back soon 5 stars
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your five-star review. We are delighted to hear that you had a positive experience with us at The Captains Boil. We hope you ll visit us again soon.

reviews.review_text: Excellent taste. The sauces they served are very unique. Captain s boil sauce is my favorite one.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that we were able to provide you with an enjoyable dining experience.

reviews.review_text: Taste very good. server is nice. I love the fried rice. Love the spicy. very convince location, right at the heart of Downtown. Parking in the front was very cheap $1 per hours.

Was pleased to discover a location that opened nearby. We enjoyed our pound of shrimp selection with added okra and sausage. We opted for the medium spice level for the Captains Boil flavour and for a girl who enjoys spicy food, I was happy we didnt go for the fire level. The spice sneaks up on you. Its a licensed establishment, and the cold Sapporo beer was the perfect accompaniment.
Very unique place to eat. Food was excellent. What I ordered came in a bag that was different. Worth the experience. Prices very do to market price. I would definitely eat there again.
Delicious seafood platter with the chicken wings are my favourite dishes in The Captain s Boil
Great price for great food.  Also, AYCE for shrimp is coming up.
Soooo good   will be back when I am in Vancouver. Definitely worth it.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience at The Captains Boil. We are so pleased to hear you found your experience your liking. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

reviews.review_text: Food is delicious. Service was very good. I love the lobstor sooooo much.  Their caption boil sauce is the best
Great food with great quality and service is always very good. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_text: Great service and good place for sea food. Sad that the crab we wanted wasnt available! But rest was great.
No frills, eat with your hands, fresh seafood, great value, and lots of side options.  A great place for seafood with reasonable prices.  I would definitely come again.
A wonderful concept, offering delicious food at reasonable prices. Experience the best seafood in the city at The Captains Boil Robson Street. This was an unsolicited review.
Sea food tester was veeery good
Recently tried their Robson location with my family. They serve excellent food for a great price. Super friendly service & they explained everything in detail. We loved it!!
Absolutely worth it!! Food is delicious, great experience, one of a kind, my new go to seafood restaurant, great job really
This isnt by any means a fancy restaurant (you get lobster bibs and the food arrives in bags), but the food quality is comparable to the finest restaurants Ive dined at.
I have ordered thru Uber eats on numerous occasions and have never been disappointed, good size portions and very very tasty
Excellent. I had the dungeoness crab. Cooked to perfection. Will eat here again when in town again
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Troy, thanks for the rating. If there are any details you d like to share about what we are doing well, we d love to learn more!

reviews.review_text: Amazing food, , great customer service , I liked their spicy Okra and spicy mussels with seafood fried rice .

My wife and I always come here for the seafood...call it a lil taste of home .the seafood here is done perfectly the way we want it..we recommend this restaurant to all that love tasty ,delicious seafood
Orders one live whole lobster platter plus side order one lobster for total CAD$130.  Fresh and delicious
Love the eating with my hand. It was an amazing experience for the whole family and we all enjoyed it so much
just delicious and clean place

Great place for a seafood feast, lots of food for the price you pay, got the pirates feast, filled the 2 of us with still quite a bit of food wasted (sorry lol).

Always good food here. Be careful of the cajun fries, pretty spicy.
Im happy this place exists...honestly. I was able to eat foods close to what I know from back home in Nigeria...not exactly, but close.
Friendly service and good food. We really like the spice level
Delicious! Made me realize how much I love king crab legs with their special sauce.
My wife and I absolutely loved our meal here. We will be back.
I loved the shrimp, corn, sausage, all its delicious
Great product and awesome people. A must visit for sure. You will love this place
